title: Crown of righteousness
creator_credit: Norman Walker, Ray Hoke and GHW Production
brief_description: Paul’s captivity in Rome. Ephroditus bring him gifts from the Church in Phillippi. A reconstruction of the events relation to St Paul’s re-arrest and hie trial before Nero (2 Timothy IV 7-8).
